name: Sandy Stone's Shadow Demo
description:
A cowboy themed dating sim. This is the demo/prologue, so there are no routes or further content yet- Follow drow3n on insta for updates!

Gender Neutral MC!! Will have 6 routes to try, 2 bandits and 4 townspeople. Each one gets 2 endings, a good one and a less good one.

All art and code done by Drow3n, music from free music archive

*Since this is the demo, i am happy to hear all constructive criticism and notes! I know art is messy and there's typos so please refrain from mentioning that.
